title: A Park Landscape
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Jean-Baptiste Oudry [1686-1755], Paris and Beauvais, France. Jules Opigez [1]; given by him to his friend Gustave Aimard [2]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, likely by June 1974 but by December 4, 1975 [3]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. According to inscription on mat.
[2]. See note [1]. Probably the French writer Gustave (born Olivier) Aimard [1818-1883], Paris, France.
[3]. Received at the museum on December 4, 1975.

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, ÃŽle-de-France, France)
